title: 2 bedroom end of terrace house for sale in Shepperd Street, Tidworth, SP9 7WS, SP9
description: Offered to the market is this well-presented two-bedroom semi-detached home for sale in the sought-after development of Riverbourne Fields. This charming home offers a perfect blend of modern living and comfortable spaces, ideal for a variety of buyers.Upon entering the home, you are greeted by a welcoming hallway that leads to a convenient downstairs W.C. The  living room provides a cosy retreat for relaxation and entertaining. Adjacent to the living room is the contemporary kitchen dining room, which features wall hung and base level units. The dining area boasts double doors that open into the garden, allowing for a transition between indoor and outdoor living. The upstairs of the home comprises two double bedroom, and a family bathroom.Externally, the property benefits from a larger-than-average garden. Parking is conveniently situated at the front of the home. Positioned within close proximity to the plain, this home allows for easy access to walking activities and expansive green spaces, perfect for those seeking outdoor recreation. This delightful home in Riverbourne Fields is not to be missed, council tax band C.

DESCRIPTION :
Nestled away at the end of a cul-de-sac on the River Bourne Fields development in Tidworth, this 2015 constructed, terraced, three-bedroomed house benefits from proximity to local schools and amenities. With allocated parking for two vehicles, the accommodation comprises an entrance hallway, a living room, kitchen/dining room, cloakroom, two first floor bedrooms with a bathroom and a second floor master bedroom with an ensuite shower room. To the rear, there is an enclosed garden with a patio area ideal for outside dining.

LOCATION :
Tidworth is approximately 10 miles west of Andover, 12 miles south of Marlborough, 24 miles south of Swindon, 15 miles north by north-east of Salisbury and 6 miles east of Amesbury. Tidworth is very well stocked with local facilities, which include two supermarkets, two veterinary surgeries, various eateries, a dental practice, one infant school, three primary schools, leisure/fitness centre & swimming pool. It also has Tidworth Polo Club, which is the second largest in the country and frequently plays host to royals.

agentDescriptionHtml:
| Setting the pace in estate agency since 1936

We opened the doors to the first Connells branch more than 80 years ago and have since gone on to become one of the most successful estate agency groups in the UK. We have over 180 branches covering the Midlands and South of England, each one operated by staff committed to providing you with a first-class, hassle free service.

| Call into your local Connells branch in Amesbury for all your property needs

At Connells our team are not only dedicated to help you buy or sell your home, we also offer a wide range of multi award-winning property services from conveyancing and surveys to mortgage services and asset management. Our services are tailored to meet the needs of each individual customer - contact us to see how we can help you.

| Our network and coverage

With over 180 branches throughout the Midlands and South of England our network of branches can help you search for a new property far and wide.

| Our marketing techniques will make your property stand out

Our professional marketing packages are designed to put your property at the forefront of the buyers mind. We offer packages which include featured listings across the major property portals Rightmove and Zoopla. We also offer professional photography which works well with our Audio Tours to bring your property to life for buyers. Connells know how to market property at both a local and regional level ensuring your home will be seen in its best light by as many potential buyers as possible.

| Estate agency based on trust and excellence

Whether you market your home with Connells or are looking to buy through us, you can be confident in the ability of our highly trained, determined staff to offer the highest levels of customer service to you and for your peace of mind we are also members of the Property Ombudsman.

To find out more about our services give us a call on 0198 076 7004

title: 2 bedroom bungalow for sale in Drummer Lane, Tidworth, SP9
description: A beautifully finished two bedroom attached bungalow in convenient location and offered for sale with NO CHAIN.A rare opportunity to purchase an attached bungalow which has been finished to a very high specification and situated of the the main high street in the town of Tidworth and its excellent facilities. The bungalow itself benefits from an inviting entrance hall, open plan living room open plan to the fitted kitchen, two double bedrooms and bathroom, gas central heating and double glazing, gardens which are laid to lawn, patio all enclosed by fencing. NO CHAINTidworth itself is a busy and thriving Garrison town with all the key services including an impressive local centre, doctors and dental surgeries, a leisure complex and other amenities. There are more extensive shopping areas in the nearby city of Salisbury and the pretty market town of Marlborough, both within half an hours drive. As well as polo in Tidworth and racing in Salisbury there are golf, tennis, rugby and football clubs nearby, with motor racing at Thruxton. There is also easy access out into the striking countryside of Salisbury plain, providing an excellent opportunity for riding, walking and cycling. The mainline train stations of Andover and Grateley have fast regular trains to London Waterloo and from Pewsey to London Paddington.

title: 3 bedroom semi-detached house for sale in Beale Road, Tidworth, SP9 7WN, SP9
description: Located on Beale Road, Tidworth, this three bedroom semi-detached home provides driveway parking and a modern en-suite to master bedroom. Upon entering the home you are greeted by an entrance hallway providing access to the living room on the right hand side. The living space provides a window to the front aspect, space for furnishings and under-stairs storage. Located at the rear of the home is the kitchen diner; the kitchen provides a selection of wall hung and base level units, including a fitted fridge/freezer, washing machine, dishwasher, oven and hob. French doors provide access to the low maintenance rear garden and Summer House. A cloakroom completes the downstairs accommodation.The upstairs provides three bedrooms and a modern, three-piece suite family bathroom. The master bedroom provides a en-suite shower room for additional convenience; bedrooms two and three overlook the rear of the home and are conveniently located next to the family bathroom. Externally the home provides a low maintenance rear garden laid with patio and shingle, and includes outside tap and sockets. The Summer House benefits from power and lighting, and could be utilised as an office space, or simply for relaxation. The front of the home provides parking for two vehicles (driveway) and additional visitor parking in the lay-by's positioned opposite.

agentDescriptionHtml:
The Your Move Estate and Lettings Agents Andover, based on London Road is run by Manager Oliver Smith. His team comprises of Lettings Manager Amy, Sales and Lettings Negotiator Stefan, Property Manager Christine and Property Manager Louise. Together they hold over 40 years experience in the housing market and their knowledge of the local area is second to none.

The branch has been operating for over 30 years and is locally known as the agent people can trust. The team pride themselves on excellent communication, honesty and integrity.

Andover is a quiet relaxed suburb to the north of Southampton and the east of Basingstoke. Nestled around the town are quaint villages with relaxed country pubs and beautiful cottage style properties. The area has some stunning family friendly developments and for those looking to invest, you will be interested to know that Andover is known to be much more reasonably priced in the property market compared to neighbouring suburbs.

For commuting workers, Andover is a great central location, there are excellent train links to London and nearby towns and cities, such as Bath, Bristol, Salisbury and Winchester which are all within a 90 minute train journey.

There are excellent schools in the vicinity. Rookwood School off Weyhill Road, caters for pupils aged 2 - 16. John Hanson Community School, formerly Andover Grammar School, dates back to the 16th century and is the oldest school in Andover with a great local heritage. Harrow Way Community School for 11 - 16 year olds, has been awarded consecutive GOOD ofsted reports, with many of their pupils going on to further education and university.

In terms of nightlife there are several options, including local favourite The Angel which is a great little pub and eatery on the High Street. Or why not head to Riverside Bowl for ten pin bowling followed by a game of indoor adventure golf. If you are a film buff, catch the latest blockbuster at Andover's state of the art Odeon cinema with 2D and 3D screens.

If you are searching for affordable housing in a great central location, pop in to branch today and speak to one of our trusted team. Experts in local property needs, if you are looking to buy, sell or rent then our team are ready to assist.

| Setting the pace in estate agency since 1936

We opened the doors to the first Connells branch more than 80 years ago and have since gone on to become one of the most successful estate agency groups in the UK. At Connells our team are not only dedicated to help you buy or sell your home, we also offer a wide range of multi award-winning property services from conveyancing and surveys to mortgage services and asset management. | Our network and coverage

With over 180 branches throughout the Midlands and South of England our network of branches can help you search for a new property far and wide.

title: 4 bedroom detached house for sale in Tidworth, SP9 7EU, SP9
description: Welcome to this stunning newly built home on Nepaul Road, offering 1,689 sq ft of spacious and contemporary living across three beautifully designed floors. The ground floor features a large lounge, perfect for relaxing and entertaining, along with an expansive kitchen/dining room measuring 21'1" x 10'10". This generous space provides ample room for both cooking and family meals, making it the heart of the home. A convenient downstairs W.C. is also located off the entrance hallway. On the first floor, you’ll find three well-proportioned bedrooms, including a spacious main bedroom, along with a modern family bathroom. The second floor offers versatile spaces, including an attic room and a home office, ideal for remote work or additional storage. Externally, the property includes a rear garden accessible via French doors from the living area, perfect for outdoor entertaining, and a driveway offering ample parking. This home is perfect for those seeking modern living in a newly constructed property.

title: 3 bedroom bungalow for sale in Drummer Lane, Tidworth, SP9
description: A stunning three bedroom attached bungalow , ideally situated and offered for sale with no onward chain.Tucked away just of the Main High Street with its excellent shopping facilities, Graham & Co are delighted to bring to the market this stunning attached bungalow finished to a very high specification and offered for sale with NO CHAIN. The property benefits from an entrance porch, entrance hall and cloakroom, open plan fitted kitchen leading to the living room, three double bedrooms and bathroom, gas central heating and double glazing, landscaped gardens.Tidworth itself is a busy and thriving Garrison town with all the key services including an impressive local centre, doctors and dental surgeries, a leisure complex and other amenities. There are more extensive shopping areas in the nearby city of Salisbury and the pretty market town of Marlborough, both within half an hours drive. As well as polo in Tidworth and racing in Salisbury there are golf, tennis, rugby and football clubs nearby, with motor racing at Thruxton. There is also easy access out into the striking countryside of Salisbury plain, providing an excellent opportunity for riding, walking and cycling. The mainline train stations of Andover and Grateley have fast regular trains to London Waterloo and from Pewsey to London Paddington.

title: 4 bedroom detached house for sale in Tidworth, SP9
description: A FOUR BEDROOM THREE RECEPTION ROOM EXECUTIVE HOME WITH DOUBLE GARAGE A substantial four bedroom executive home offering generous accommodation throughout. The property is located at the end of a cul-de-sac with views over open space at the front. Upon entering there is a indoor porch that gives spaces for coats and shoes that then opens up into the main entrance hallway. From the hallway there is a dual aspect lounge which runs the length of one side of the house, the lounge enjoys patio doors opening onto the garden and views over green space to the front aspect. There is also a gas fireplace with stone surround. A particular feature of the house is the wonderful kitchen breakfast room which offers plenty of space for a table together with a central island that can double up as a breakfast bar. The kitchen features an integrated double oven, gas hob with stylish extractor and an integrated dishwasher all finished with contemporary grey shaker style units and a solid stone work surface. Complementing the kitchen is the utility room which offers additional storage units, space and plumbing for a washing machine and a door to the driveway, at the side of the house. Further accommodation on the ground floor includes a large formal dining room with front facing aspect, study/ bedroom 5 and a downstairs cloakroom.Rising upstairs the large galleried landing set the tone for the space on offer. The master bedroom features a Juliet balcony enjoying elevated views of the garden together with a walk in wardrobe and adjoining en-suite shower room. Three further double bedrooms are all serviced by the four piece family bathroom comprising bath, shower cubicle, wash basin and toilet. Bedroom two also benefits from a Juliet balcony.Outside the garden offers a high degree of privacy with an expansive Sandstone patio giving plenty of space for outdoor dining. The remainder of the garden is laid to lawn with timber fencing to the side and rear. The front garden is block paved which can provide additional parking if required. There is also a driveway situated in front of the double garage. The garage offers power and lighting and currently houses a tumble dryer, there are also French doors and a personal door from the garage to the garden.Further benefits include gas fired central heating UPVC double glazing and an ingenious hoovering solution. A particular feature of the house is the wonderful kitchen breakfast room which offers plenty of space for a table together with a central island that can double up as a breakfast bar. The kitchen features an integrated double oven, gas hob with stylish extractor and an integrated dishwasher all finished with contemporary grey shaker style units and a solid stone work surface. Complementing the kitchen is the utility room which offers additional storage units, space and plumbing for a washing machine and a door to the driveway, at the side of the house. Further accommodation on the ground floor includes a large formal dining room with front facing aspect, study/ bedroom 5 and a downstairs cloakroom.

Rising upstairs the large galleried landing set the tone for the space on offer. The master bedroom features a Juliet balcony enjoying elevated views of the garden together with a walk in wardrobe and adjoining en-suite shower room. Three further double bedrooms are all serviced by the four piece family bathroom comprising bath, shower cubicle, wash basin and toilet. Bedroom two also benefits from a Juliet balcony.

Outside the garden offers a high degree of privacy with an expansive Sandstone patio giving plenty of space for outdoor dining. The remainder of the garden is laid to lawn with timber fencing to the side and rear. The front garden is block paved which can provide additional parking if required. There is also a driveway situated in front of the double garage. The garage offers power and lighting and currently houses a tumble dryer, there are also French doors and a personal door from the garage to the garden.

Further benefits include gas fired central heating UPVC double glazing and an ingenious hoovering solution. Council Tax F

title: 4 bedroom detached bungalow for sale in High Street, Shipton Bellinger, Tidworth, SP9 7UE, SP9
displayAddress: High Street, Shipton Bellinger, Tidworth, SP9 7UE
description: Welcome to Moorings; Situated in Shipton Bellinger, this four-bedroom detached bungalow offers well-balanced accommodation with generous living spaces and a practical layout. The home welcomes you via an entrance hallway, which provides access to all rooms at the property. The Living Room is located on the left hand side, and stretches over 28 feet, with double doors providing immediate access to the rear garden. Continuing through the hallway is the kitchen/breakfast room, overlooking the rear walled garden, providing a selection of wall hung and base level kitchen units. The dining room, also utilised as an additional bedroom, is a well-proportioned and versatile space, measuring 13'11" x 13'10", making it ideal for both formal dining and everyday family meals. Positioned centrally within the home, it provides easy access to both the kitchen/breakfast room and the living room.Additionally, the property offers three well-proportioned bedrooms and a modern four-piece-suite family bathroom. Bedroom one provides immediate access to the walled rear garden, and includes an en-suite shower-room for additional convenience. Bedrooms Two & Three measure 15' x 13'10" and 13'7" x 11'10" respectively, providing the home with versatile spaces for family, friends, or as home office space.Externally, the home boasts a double garage, perfect for secure parking or additional storage, alongside a wood store for neatly keeping logs and outdoor essentials. The shingle driveway is accessed via a timber gate, and is enclosed. The private rear walled garden offers a wide selection of mature and young shrubs, trees, plants and bushes, and includes sections of lawn and patio, making this an ideal space for keen gardeners and entertainers alike.

title: Equestrian facility for sale in Snoddington Lane, Shipton Bellinger, Hampshire, SP9
agent: Strutt & Parker, National Country House Department
description: The welcoming reception hall has an open fireplace and a sweeping staircase that leads to the first-floor accommodation. The ground floor reception rooms include the substantial formal drawing room, which was originally designed as a ballroom. This spectacular room features a circular nook in the corner tower and beautiful parquet flooring. There is wonderful sitting room, which features a large arched picture window to the front, and a further reception room which is currently a bright family room but could be utilised as a dining room, if required. Set off the hallway is a comfortable study and the inner hallway leads you down to a fabulous kitchen and breakfast room. This lovely living space feels very much like the ‘hub’ of the house and features bi-fold doors that open to the garden. The kitchen area itself has a bespoke range of modern fitted units that incorporate a large fridge and an Everhot range. From the breakfast area, a door leads through to the rear passage where a large walk-in larder, utility room and boot/log store rooms can be found. There are seven bedrooms on the first floor, including the stunning and rather generous principal bedroom with its en suite bathroom. Two family bathrooms are located on the first floor, as well as a useful walk-in laundry/ linen room. The second floor has a further two bedrooms and a shower room.OutsideSnoddington Manor is approached through automated wrought iron gates and down a long tree-lined driveway that culminates at the front of the house where extensive parking can be found. There are some wonderful far reaching countryside views from the house and across land belonging to the house. The formal gardens are enclosed and feature a heated swimming pool and glass summer house, and in one corner, a small copse of trees and mature bushes that attract numerous species of animals and birds; a real haven for wildlife. To the rear of the house stands the newly re-surfaced hard tennis court and beyond are 2 paddocks where a variety of livestock or horses can be kept.Set to the side of the house is an impressive Victorian stable block, which features original Victorian stalls with iron supports and railings, whilst an external staircase leads up to a significant first floor area, which is currently used as a hobbies room, although has potential to convert into a gymnasium or other leisure facility. Situated to the side of the stables is a further storage room and the garaging.Lot 2Further pasture land to the north and west of the house with access off Snoddington LaneAbout 18.94 acresLot 32 large agricultural barns and further pasture/paddock land to the north and east of the houseAbout 18.85 acresLot 4Delightful detached lodge houseAbout 0.39 acresSnoddington Manor is in a rural position just outside the Hampshire village of Shipton Bellinger. The village provides several everyday amenities, including a local shop, a village hall and a primary school, while further facilities can be accessed less than three miles away in Tidworth, including a range of shops and supermarkets. Further schooling in the area includes the outstanding-rated Bishop’s Wordsworth CofE Grammar School, the independent Salisbury Cathedral School and Farleigh School. The area is well connected by road with the A303 passing nearby, while mainline rail can be accessed at Grateley, which runs regular services to London Waterloo.

agentDescriptionHtml:
The Your Move Estate and Lettings Agents Andover, based on London Road is run by Manager Oliver Smith. His team comprises of Lettings Manager Amy, Sales and Lettings Negotiator Stefan, Property Manager Christine and Property Manager Louise. Together they hold over 40 years experience in the housing market and their knowledge of the local area is second to none.

The branch has been operating for over 30 years and is locally known as the agent people can trust. The team pride themselves on excellent communication, honesty and integrity.

Andover is a quiet relaxed suburb to the north of Southampton and the east of Basingstoke. Nestled around the town are quaint villages with relaxed country pubs and beautiful cottage style properties. The area has some stunning family friendly developments and for those looking to invest, you will be interested to know that Andover is known to be much more reasonably priced in the property market compared to neighbouring suburbs.

For commuting workers, Andover is a great central location, there are excellent train links to London and nearby towns and cities, such as Bath, Bristol, Salisbury and Winchester which are all within a 90 minute train journey.

There are excellent schools in the vicinity. Rookwood School off Weyhill Road, caters for pupils aged 2 - 16. John Hanson Community School, formerly Andover Grammar School, dates back to the 16th century and is the oldest school in Andover with a great local heritage. Harrow Way Community School for 11 - 16 year olds, has been awarded consecutive GOOD ofsted reports, with many of their pupils going on to further education and university.

In terms of nightlife there are several options, including local favourite The Angel which is a great little pub and eatery on the High Street. Or why not head to Riverside Bowl for ten pin bowling followed by a game of indoor adventure golf. If you are a film buff, catch the latest blockbuster at Andover's state of the art Odeon cinema with 2D and 3D screens.

If you are searching for affordable housing in a great central location, pop in to branch today and speak to one of our trusted team. Experts in local property needs, if you are looking to buy, sell or rent then our team are ready to assist.

title: 2 bedroom terraced house for sale in Ordnance Road, Tidworth, SP9 7QB, SP9
description: A two bedroom home on Ordnance Road. Tidworth, offered to the market with No Onward Chain. The ground floor of the home provides an entrance hallway, living room, downstairs w.c., and kitchen providing a selection of wall hung and base level units, with plumbing for white goods. Upstairs this home provides two double bedrooms, with both including built in wardrobe space. The main bedrooms measures an impressive 13' x 11'1".  Externally the home provides gardens to the rear and front; one is laid primarily to lawn and the other is laid to shingle.

Choose your local Amesbury Fox & Sons office...

We're a long-established estate agency brand; in fact Fox & Sons has been trading since all the way back in 1868, so you can trust we are experts in our field. If you need a little more convincing here's a few more reasons to choose Fox & Sons as your estate agent...

>> Your local Fox & Sons team in Amesbury

Our team know the area and the marketplace. Most of our staff members live in the surrounding areas so we are your local experts too! We know what helps to sell or let a property and we love helping to find buyers and tenants their properties too...we just want to help our customers get moving.

>> Our network and coverage

Fox & Sons has over 57 offices throughout the South Coast region covering East Sussex, West Sussex, Devon, Wiltshire, Hampshire, Somerset and Dorset. We're bigger than you think. We are part of the national estate agency group Sequence (UK) Limited which has over 320 offices across England, Scotland and Wales. So, if you need to expand your property search further, we can help with that too - all from your local office.

>> Making your property stand out from the crowd

Our property marketing techniques make sure our customers properties stand out and get noticed. Find out how; speak to us about our online extra marketing packages.

>> Trust us

We hold memberships with industry bodies such as the Property Ombudsman and the ARLA Propertymark for Residential Lettings, so you can have peace of mind knowing you are dealing with a trusted, professional estate agent.

When choosing an estate agent, make sure you pick an experienced, professional, established estate agent just like us! It could be the difference between selling or letting your property. To find out more contact us your local Fox & Sons estate agent today on 0198 076 7005

title: 2 bedroom terraced house for sale in Pickernell Road, Tidworth, SP9 7FU, SP9
description: This two-bedroom home on Pickernell Road offers a cosy and modern living space, ideal for first-time buyers or those looking to downsize. Upon entering, you're greeted by an open-plan kitchen/reception room measuring an impressive 22' x 12'2. This versatile space combines a fully equipped kitchen with storage and workspace alongside a welcoming living area, perfect for relaxing or entertaining. Completing the ground floor is a convenient cloakroom with WC, adding practicality to the layout. Upstairs, the home boasts two well-proportioned bedrooms, each measuring 12'2 x 7'11, offering comfort and flexibility for a variety of needs. The first floor also features a contemporary bathroom with a three-piece suite, providing both style and functionality. To the rear of the home is a garden laid to lawn, with French Doors providing access to this space. The home provides parking for two cars.Estate Charge for 2024 - £170.01
